So that anyone generally speaking in the present tense, saying there is
not an improper relationship, would be telling the truth if that person
said there was not, in the present tense; the present tense encompassing
many months. That’s what I meant by that....
Q:If Monica Lewinsky has stated that her affidavit that she didn’t have a sex-
ual relationship with you is, in fact, a lie, I take it you disagree with that?
